videos.title: Cross The Pond Westbound 2025 | VATSIM Event BCN ✈️ IAD
videos.description:
Join us live on VATSIM in Barcelona as we prepare our United Boeing 777-200ER for a transatlantic flight to Washinton Dulles International with full ATC coverage and 1300 other virtual pilots. Follow along as we setup the aircraft for departure, brief our mission, get clearances and operate the ETOPS flight across the pond.

Flight time today is expected to be just short of 9 hours.

If unfamiliar, Cross The Pond is the largest online virtual flying event that takes place twice a year on Vatsim. In H1 the event is westbound, with flights from Europe and Africa heading to North and Central America. In H2 the event reverses direction and all flights head eastbound.

📍 Route
GRAUS M601 BLV M190 LASKU DCT VES DCT PITAX 46N020W 46N030W 46N040W 45N050W RAFIN VITOL KB66E SPDEY Q167 KALDA SAWED THHMP CAVLR6

💻 Simulator
X-Plane 12 - https://www.x-plane.com 

🛩️ Aircraft
Boeing 777-200ER - FlightFactor https://www.flgihtfactor.aero 

🌎 Scenery
LEBL Barcelona - https://www.aerosoft.com/en/shop/flight/x-plane/x-plane-11/sceneries/xp-europe/3152/airport-barcelona-xp 
KIAD Washington Dulles International - https://store.x-plane.org/KIAD--Washington-Dulles-International-Airport_p_1574.html 

💿 Add-ons
xPilot Vatsim Client - https://docs.xpilot-project.org 

🕹️ Flight Hardware
Virpil VPC Flight Pedals - https://virpil-controls.us.com/vpc-ace-flight-pedals.html
Thrustmaster TCA Boeing Throttle - https://www.thrustmaster.com/en-us/products/tca-yoke-pack-boeing-edition/
Thrustmaster TCA Boeing Yoke

🖥️ Computer Specs
AMD Ryzen 9 7950X
64GB DDR5 G-Skill Memory
Gigabyte Aorus Xtreme X670E Mobo
Nvidia G-Force RTX 4090 Founders Edition
LG UltraWide Monitor, 34” 5K2K 10-bit HDR 600nits
Windows 11 Pro

CPU and GPU are cooled by independent custom loop using EKWB parts. CPU, GPU and Memory are overclocked.

videos.title: The Art Of Flight Simulation | 2025
videos.description:
Flight simulation is simply stunning in 2025. What a time to be alive. This short film celebrates the type of flying I enjoy when flying in the virtual world, whether online or not.

I started using Flight Simulators over 30 years ago as a much younger person. If I could show my 8 year old self how things would look in the future, my mind would be blown 🤯 ! Just imagine what flight simulation will feel like in another 30 years.

This film is a sequel of sorts to another experiement I posted onto Vimeo in 2016, which was also showcasing the best of flight simulation in that era – how things have progressed. Those who have seen the 2016 version will notice a number of nods to that piece in this version.

Art of Flight | 2016 https://vimeo.com/194935864 

💻 Simulators
Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020 https://www.flightsimulator.com 
X-Plane 12 https://www.x-plane.com

videos.title: Flight dispatching tutorial | SimBrief to Aircraft init using the ACARS datalink | Toliss A321
videos.description:
In this video I dive deep into the world of flight planning and dispatching and then loading flight plans with wind data into an Airbus via the ACARS datalink, which significantly reduces the amount of time in the cockpit spent setting up your flight.

By the end of this tutorial you will be able to;

* Connect Toliss Aircraft to your SimBrief account
* Save airframes to your SimBrief account
* Use FlightAware to create real world flight operations
* Initialize a flight in Airbus Aircraft using ACARS datalink
* Load a flight plan from SimBrief via ACARS datalink
* Load wind data from SimBrief via ACARS datalink
* Load Take-Off performance data from ACARS

Thank you Simon for the question that prompted this video!

00:00 - Introduction
02:11 - Connect the Toliss to your SimBrief Pilot ID
07:28 - Real world operations in the sim
09:32 - Flight dispatching tools
11:38 - A very brief Cost Index overview
12:29 - Real World Flight Details
12:54 - SimBrief Introduction
15:08 - Creating a new airframe from a template
24:22 - Create a new flight plan
34:20 - Pilot briefing
37:32 - Cockpit preparation
41:11 - Flight initialization in the ATSU via ACARS
45:13 - Obtain ATIS and METAR in the ATSU
46:35 - Flight plan departure setup
49:08 - Obtain trip wind data via ACARS
52:22 - Flight plan verification 
54:48 - Obtain Take-off performance data from ACARS
58:27 - Closing remarks

📍Tools
SimBrief Dispatching - https://www.simbrief.com/home/
Toliss SimBrief Saved Airframe Profiles - https://forums.x-plane.org/index.php?/forums/topic/202921-simbrief-saved-airframes/
FlightAware - https://www.flightaware.com

💻 Simulator
X-Plane 12 https://www.x-plane.com

🛩️ Aircraft
Airbus A321 - Toliss https://store.x-plane.org/Airbus-A321-XP12-by-Toliss_p_1632.html

🌎 Scenery
LOWW Vienna International Airport GAYA Simulations - https://www.gaya-simulations.com/products/vienna

videos.title: miniCockpit Airbus FCU add-on for flight simulator
videos.description:
Brief review of the miniCockpit miniFCU add-on now generally available to all that wish to purchase it. This hardware add-on for both Microsoft Flight Simulator and X-Plane provides the complete functionality of the Airbus FCU in supported aircraft.

This review looks at the hardware, software and how to mount it on a VESA compatible stand.

02:28 - Unboxing and hardware review
03:46 - VESA Mount Install
04:46 - Software
05:15 - One gripe about the supplied USB cable
05:37 - Summary and closing remarks

🕹️ Flight Hardware

Soul River - Daniel Brown
Unwind - Mansij

videos.title: 🇳🇿 ANZ 447 Wellington to Auckland | Figuring out the landing flare of the ✈️ Fenix A320  | MSFS
videos.description:
The Fenix A320 on final has never felt right when compared to other Airbus aircraft. For me the flare/ground effect has always felt too severe.

I return to this aircraft after a long break and several updates to see if things have changed.

Join us on this Air New Zealand A320 shuttle service on the North Island from Wellington to Auckland.

videos.title: 🎥 How I setup my Custom Cameras in MSFS without add-ons | Setup guide and cheat sheet
videos.description:
Part 2: Custom Camera Setup in MSFS

I share my standard Custom Camera keyboard short cuts that I have used across multiple flight simulators for the last ten years. These key bindings enable me to focus on flying and not where a particular panel in my aircraft is.

Ideally, everyone should have their own view key binding system that is consistent and scalable across aircraft and simulators, so that muscle memory takes over controlling your perspective when flying. This is the system I use and I'm sharing it with you all.

📄 MSFS Custom Camera Cheat Sheet https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_iO0SFMuqJm0kkoHlYqZuPMOiKsedIiD3W8r6wXoWlU/

00:00 - Introduction
01:10 - Custom Camera Key Bindings Config
03:12 - View setup in Boeing 737-800
04:42 - View setup in TBM 850
05:45 - Camera Movement
07:07 - Closing remarks


💻 Simulator
MSFS - https://www.flightsimulator.com

🌎 Scenery

🛩️ Aircraft
Boeing 737-800 - PMDG https://pmdg.com/pmdg-737-800-for-microsoft-flight-simulator/
TBM 850 - Blacksquare https://www.justflight.com/product/black-square-tbm-850

videos.title: Flying snowboarders 🏂 to Big Sky, MT 🏔️ | Delta Airlines Ops | A20N KLAX to KBZN
videos.description:
We take command of the DAL3669 service from Los Angeles to Bozeman, MT, a popular route in winter that transports winter sports enthusiasts from Southern California to the Big Sky mountain resort in Montana.

Today we are piloting the Airbus A320neo. This specific airframe was recently delivered from Airbus to Delta. It still has that new plane smell on board.

videos.title: [MSFS] Christmas Day Chill flying around my old stomping grounds in a Commanche
videos.description: Just chilling before the craziness of Christmas day!

videos.title: [VATSIM] Last Minute Shopping, ✈️ flying Prime packages from Chicago to Minneapolis on xmas eve 🎄🧑‍🎄
videos.description:
Join me as I try (and maybe fail) to redeem myself after Friday's disastrous FNO where a rogue pilot, go around and then complete control loss resulted in a terrible disaster outside of Chicago.

Tonight we will try and take the most dangerous plane there is back from the wreckage heap in Chicago to Minneapolis in the annual Vatsim Last Minute Shopping Event.

light Simulator: 
- Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020 (https://www.flightsimulator.com/)

Aircraft:
- PMDG B737-800 (https://pmdg.com/pmdg-737-800-for-microsoft-flight-simulator/)

Scenery:
- FS Dream Team Chicago O'Hare International (https://www.fsdreamteam.com/products_kordv2_msfs.html)
- Flightbeam Minneapolis St Paul International (https://www.flightbeam.net/product-page2/kmsp-for-microsoft-flight-simulator)

Vatsim Client:
- vPilot (https://vpilot.rosscarlson.dev/)

videos.title: [VATSIM] FNO Home for the Holidays Chicagoland event
videos.description: As the year comes to a close, families are travelling home to celebrate their observed holidays.  Airlines and Air Traffic Control work hand in hand to ensure they get to where they need to go safely and on time.  Join ZAU at O'Hare International Airport and Midway International Airport in Chicago for our annual Home For The Holidays event.  Even if you're not from the city or surrounding suburbs, come visit us in Chicago and swing by Navy Pier for their annual Winter Wonderland exhibit with a giant tree and indoor skating rink, Michigan Avenue for all the sights and the Bean, then head back to either airport to finish your connection home.

videos.title: [VATSIM] FNO Cornfield Crossfire 2, Spirit Ops from Chicago to Cincinnati
videos.description:
There's more to the midwest than meets the eye! Join us for some of the most exciting flying you'll find among the cornfields!

Jump onboard and fight for your seat on this Spirit A320neo between the Second City and Cincinnati.

videos.title: [VATSIM Event] Cross The Land Americas 2023
videos.description:
Cross the Land is happy to introduce/present our first edition of Cross The Lands : Americas!  On December 2nd 2023, depart from a North American Airport and arrive at a South American Airport. 

Join us as we pick up Avianca Airlines operations from Phoenix to Bogata, Colombia.

videos.title: SXM Princess Juliana 🛬 arrivals and departures 🛫 captured from Maho Beach, Sint Maarten
videos.description:
During my trip to the Caribbean island of Saint Martin 🇫🇷 / Sint Maarten 🇳🇱 over Thanksgiving, I took myself to the world famous Maho Beach just feet away from the threshold of Princess Juliana Internatinonal Airport’s Runway 10. Situated on the beach with a cold drink, we spent a sunny afternoon watching many arrivals and departures from the warm golden sands, dipping our toes in the aqua blue Caribbean Sea.

✈️ Aircraft Spotted

- Airbus A330-300 (Air France, KLM)
- Airbus A320-200 (JetBlue)
- Airbus A320neo (Spirit)
- Boeing 737-600 (United)
- Boeing 757-200 (Delta)
- Cessna 208 Caravan
- ATR-42
- DeHavilland Twin Otter
- Britten Islander
- Challenger 650  

Sit back on the sandy beach, grab a cold drink and watch all of the arrivals and departures from this little airport in the heart of paradise.

This video was shot entirely on an iPhone 15 Pro Max using the camera app, and edited and finalized using Davinci Resolve on the iPad. This is the first time I have produced a video entirely on mobile operating systems.

videos.title: [VATSIM Event] Over the River and Through the Woods FNO
videos.description:
VATSIM Friday Night Operations takes us to the Great Lakes for the Over the River and through the Woods event.

Join us as we pick up Delta Airlines operations from MSP to DTW and back again, helping families reach loved ones in and around the Great Lakes.

videos.title: JetBlue A320neo LA to Sacramento
videos.description: Chilling post cross the pond with a Cali flight to the state capital

videos.title: Cross The Pond Eastbound 2023 - JetBlue A321neo LR Boston to London Heathrow
videos.description:
Join me as I virtually pilot an Airbus A321neo Long Range from Boston Logan International Airport to London Heathrow, alongside thousands of other virtual pilots with live ATC on Vatsim taking part in Cross The Pond Eastbound 2023. Will I make it safely? Or run out of fuel? Or will the simulator crash? Hop on board on Saturday as we navigate 2500 miles of ocean.

Cross the Pond is a twice-yearly event featuring virtual air traffic controlling divisions on both sides of the Atlantic Ocean providing a complete ATC service, supporting over 2000 virtual pilots cross the pond.

I have participated in the Cross The Pond event for many years, starting in 2016 flying the PMDG Boeing 777 from Frankfurt to Miami. Since then I have flown the event from Paris to Newark, New York to London, Atlanta to Vienna to name a few.

videos.description: Testing setup ahead of CTP Eastbound 2023

videos.title: Snowboarding: Atmospheric river delivers endless champagne powder at Northstar Resort, California
videos.description:
During the month of January 2023, an atmospheric river delivered a record breaking amount of water to California in the first two weeks of the year. This video was made during the second weekend of January, with storm numbers 10 through 12 arriving in the Sierras.

Base depth was well over 120" at Northstar at the beginning of the weekend and over a foot of snow fell while I was there.

Although the atmospheric river has caused considerable damage to large parts of California due to sink holes, mud slides and other storm damage, for winter sports enthusiasts the 22/23 season just received a huge boost in snow that will likely last well into April.

Shot Using:
- Sony A7SIII
- DJI Osma 3
- iPhone 13 Pro Max
- insta360 X3

Post Production:
- Davinci Resolve
- insta360 Studio

Music Credits:
- "Feast of Starlight", Elad Perez
- "The Giants", Evgeny Bardyuzha

Music Licensed by:
- Artist.io

Snowboard:
- Capita Mega Mercury 2023 with Union Atlas Pro 2023 Bindings

videos.title: Northstar Resort: Snowboarding from top of the Comstock chair to the bottom
videos.description:
Snowboarding at Northstar, California. Riding down from the top of the new Comstock six chair express to the bottom of the chair, via West Ridge, Lookout Road, Upper Pioneer and then Lower Pioneer.

This was just to test the Insta360 X3 camera in action. Riding was a little stiff due to getting comfortable with the stance holding the camera. Conditions were crispy and icy on this day at about 0°C/32°F.

Snowboard: Capita Mercury
Bindings: Union Force

videos.title: Flying the Pattern at DuPage in the MSFS default Cessna 172
videos.description:
This is the first in a series of videos covering the fundamentals of flying in Microsoft Flight Simulator. As in real life, learning to take off, land and fly a controlled pattern are skills that will help any virtual pilot even in commercial jets.

In this video we take the default Cessna 172 out for some pattern work at DuPage (KDPA) airport, just to the west of Chicago. We will practice setting up the aircraft for flying; flying the pattern at DuPage off Runway 20R; and communication with the tower during the exercise.

DuPage is the airport where I did my initial flight training and flew the pattern on runway 20R for many, many, many hours!

videos.title: Debrief Cross The Pond Eastbound 2022; Featuring the ToLiss A340-600 in X-Plane 12 Beta
videos.description:
Cross The Pond Eastbound 2022 took place on October 22, concluding the 2022 season of VATSIM events over the Atlantic.

In this video I debrief my experience flying the Eastbound event in October 2022 and discuss what I think is good about the event, and some areas that could be improved upon for greater experience.

To help navigate the discussion, the debrief is separated into the following sections;

• Preparation for the event
• Event Itself
• Simulator State of the Union for the event

Links;

• https://ctp.vatsim.net - Cross The Pond
• https://tinyurl.com/bdv3arbm - SELCAL specification
• https://www.x-plane.com - X-Plane
• https://beta.xpilot-project.org - xPilot Vatsim Client for X-Plane
• https://toliss.com/products/#a346 - ToLiss A340-600

videos.title: Cross The Pond Eastbound 2022 - Taking the A340-600 to Vienna in X-Plane 12. What could go wrong?
videos.description:
CTP Eastbound 2022. This time around taking the ToLiss A340-600 in Lufthansa livery across the pond from Atlanta to Vienna.

This will be the first time I have taken the A346 across the pond during this event and will also be the first time I am using Xplane 12 for a major Vatsim event.

During this flight we will be chatting about the state of flight sim as we go into 2023.

Unfortunately we did not make it to Vienna. Skip to the end to find out what happened!
